name: Wobblenaught's Dream Machine
description:
Finish Wobblenaught's dream! Face two platforming levels, collect coins, gather cogs to fuel the machine. Aim for a high score!

Controls
Standard WASD movement
Space to jump - hold to glide
ESC To return to the main menu (and lose all progress!)

My First Game Jam Summer 2017 Submission

Thanks for playing!
